title: The said Regulations shall be called as “The Development Control Regulations for the Slum Rehabilita
clause_text: The said Regulations shall be called as “The Development Control Regulations for the Slum Rehabilitation Authority, Pune & Pimpri-Chinchwad Area, Pune, 2022 (hereinafter called ― the said regulations‖)
